data.name: AliceIntroDescription
data.value: The key of the puzzle is to be like a trouble!

data.name: AliceShortDescription
data.value: Be KILLED by an IMPOSTOR or be the last stand

data.name: AliceFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive victory. MISSION 1: Be KILLED by an IMPOSTOR MISSION 2: Be the last two alive and the other player is NOT a NEUTRAL role *Being KILLed by other teams/players exept Impostors does not achieve MISSION 1. *If you get EXILED in a meeting, you will lose the game. "MISCHIEF" : Don't let the tasks end! - Decreases everyone's task completetion and adds a new task to be cleared additionally. Beware for both IMPOSTORS and CREWMATES because you're a strong role!

data.name: JackalUpgradeSidekickNum
data.value: No. of Sidekicks promoting on Jackal's death

data.name: JackalCanSeeImpostorToSidekickImpostor
data.value: Does show Sidekicked-Impostors as an Impostor

data.name: SidekickHasOtherKillCool
data.value: Sidekicks: Does have a modified Kill Cooldown

data.name: SidekickHasOtherKillRange
data.value: Sidekicks: Does have a modified Kill Distance

data.name: SidekickApplyEnvironmentVisionEffect
data.value: Sidekicks: Does sabotage effect their vision

data.name: JackalIntroDescription
data.value: It's OUR time to take over this ship!

data.name: JackalShortDescription
data.value: Be the last stand with your Sidekick

data.name: JackalFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive victory. MISSION: Halve the remaining players with your own team, and eliminate all other IMPOSTORS / NEUTRALS with the KILL ability "SIDEKICK" : Turns a player into your sidekick! - Fully overwrites their former role, and changes into a "Sidekick" - "LOVERS" may have some specific settings when sidekick-ed, please check your game configuration

data.name: SidekickShortDescription
data.value: Assist your Jackal and achive victory

data.name: SidekickFullDescription
data.value:
Your Jackal: "{0}"
A NEUTRAL role with the mission to assist your Jackal! MISSION: Halve the remaining players with your own team, and eliminate all other IMPOSTORS / NEUTRALS with the KILL ability. When your Jackal is eliminated from the game, your role may promote and may change to a new Jackal.

data.name: TaskMasterIntroDescription
data.value: I have the duty to complete all tasks!

data.name: TaskMasterFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive victory. MISSION: Complete all tasks before your death / the game ends When you die before you complete all the tasks, you cannot achive your mission, unlike the SURVIVOR. A set amount of additional tasks will be added after you cleared all the set global tasks.

data.name: MissionaryTellDeparture
data.value: Can Missionary know when a player suicides

data.name: MissionaryIntroDescription
data.value: Lead the crew to the heaven of truce

data.name: MissionaryFullDescription
data.value:
A NEUTRAL role with the ability "PROPAGATE". MISSION: Halve the remaining players with your own team, and eliminate all other IMPOSTORS / NEUTRALS with the KILL ability. "PROPAGATE" : Lets a player die after a random count. - Any player who is propagated will die/suicide ("Departure") after a random count. - The count will be set randomly between the max and min time configuration. - Departure can even take place while meetings.
<When Enabled> "CONDUCT" : Propagation but with a quick effect. - Occurs when targeting a player who you voted in a meeting with PROPAGATE - Immediately lets the targeted player die - The game adds targetable players in a "Target list". No players can be added over the set limit; When the list is full, at least one player on the list must be eliminated from the game to add a new player as a target.

data.name: departureText
data.value: Another wanderer found the heavens' ladder.

data.name: JesterIntroDescription
data.value: HIPPITY HOPPITY THE MEETING IS MY PROPERTY!

data.name: JesterShortDescription
data.value: Bring chaos to the ship and be EXILED

data.name: JesterFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achieve. MISSION : Be exiled to win. *STATS may show the Jester as alive from game latencies/lags. "OUTBURST" : Triggers targeted player's KILL after a set timer. - Can use this ability on any player, with our without the KILL ability. - Fails to trigger KILL when : 1. The targeted player does not have the ability KILL 2. No player is in range of the targeted player 3. The triggered KILL is targeted to you (The JESTER who used the OUTBURST ability)

data.name: YandereTargetKilledKillCoolReduceRate
data.value: Kill Cooldown reduction when Killing a OBSTACLE

data.name: YandereNoneTargetKilledKillCoolMultiplier
data.value: Kill Cooldown penalty when Killing a normal player

data.name: YandereBlockTargetTime
data.value: Players will counted as OBSTACLES from

data.name: YandereSetTargetTime
data.value: Counts player as an OBSTACLE after

data.name: YandereRunawayTime
data.value: After OBSTACLES are all dead, turns into STAMPEDE MODE in:

data.name: YandereHasOneSidedArrow
data.value: Does show arrows to your SWEETIE

data.name: YandereHasTargetArrow
data.value: Does show arrows to your OBSTACLES

data.name: YandereFullDescription
data.value:
A NEUTRAL role who wants to KILL all other living players exept your SWEETIE. MISSION 1 : Achive victory with your "SWEETIE" - You need to meet several conditions: 1. Your SWEETIE is alive 2. Eliminate all other IMPOSTORS / NEUTRALS with abilities to eliminate players (i.e. KILL, PROPAGATE) exept your SWEETIE. 3. All other alive members are on your team / is your SWEETIE MISSION 2 : Become the last two in the ship, and the other player does not have abilities to KILL or make you die. NOTE: Both missions does not count the ASSASIN as a "harmful" player, if the ASSASIN cannot be KILLed by its options.
"SWEETIE" : When the game starts, a player will randomly set as your "SWEETIE". When any other player stays for a set duration, the player will be count as a "OBSTACLE". When there is one or more OBSTACLEs alive, you will able to use the KILL ability.
<When KILLing OBSTACLEs> - your Kill Cooldown will have a massive reduction - when there are no more OBSTACLEs alive, you lose your KILL ability until there is a new OBSTACLE. <When KILLing other players exept OBSTACLEs> - an adittional cooldown will be added to your KILL. (can be multiplied) Any Kill Cooldown change will be reset after any meeting.
"STAMPEDE MODE" : Your KILL ability can be used while this mode, not regarding OBSTACLEs alive. You enter this mode when: - There is no new OBSTACLEs added for a set duration - Your SWEETIE is no more alive

data.name: YandereShipJustForTwo
data.value: The Yandere wins with true love....

data.name: YokoShortDescription
data.value: Keep alive and steal the glory

data.name: TotocalcioShortDescription
data.value: Bet to a player and lead them to victory

data.name: TotocalcioFullDescription
data.value:
A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive victory. MISSION: BET to a player, and let the player win the game! "BET": Bet your chips to the targeted player! - Only targets one player - A green mark will show up on their player name when you've BET - When the targeted player wins the game, you will too! - The ability cooldown will be longer depending on the number of remaining players
*Some NEUTRAL victories cannot be applied: - Youko - Vigirante

data.name: loseNow
data.value: I'm sure I'm going to lose now…

data.name: MinerNoneActiveTime
data.value: "LANDMINE" : Cooldown until Landmine activation after game start / meetings

data.name: MinerCanShowNoneActiveAnotherPlayer
data.value: Can other players know the Landmine before activation

data.name: MinerShowKillLog
data.value: Does show alert of Landmine deaths

data.name: MinerShortDescription
data.value: BLAST all your mates with LANDMINES

data.name: MinerFullDescription
data.value:
A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive victory. MISSION: Halve the remaining players with your own team, and eliminate all other IMPOSTORS / NEUTRALS with the KILL ability.
"LANDMINE" : Sets a Landmine on your position. - The Landmine blows up one player within a set range. This includes the Miner itself. - The Landmine activates after a set cooldown after ability usage, and after initial game start / each meetings. Don't forget your mine and blow up yourself! - After activation, the Landmine will be removed/nullified. - The "Kill log" is only a flavor text and has no specific meaning besides Landmine activation. - You can warp between all VENTs when the corresponding option is enabled!

data.name: EaterKillEatActiveCoolTimeReduceRate
data.value: "EAT/VORE" : Reduction rate of cooldown after meetings without eating any players

data.name: EaterIsShowArrowForDeadBody
data.value: Does show arrows to dead bodies

data.name: EaterShortDescription
data.value: Eat mates and foes, dead or alive

data.name: EaterFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive victory. MISSION: EAT and VORE a set amount of players/dead bodies. "EAT" : Eats and deletes dead bodies. - Multiplies and adds penalty for "VORE" ability cooldown on body consumption for a set rate. "VORE" : Vores and eliminates a player nearby. - Can be used while a player is near you - After a set duration, the targeted player will be erased/vored, nullifying any kind of barriers or guards! - Multiplies and adds penalty for "VORE" and "EAT" ability cooldown on player consumption for a set rate. *Both "EAT" and "VORE" recieves a cooldown reduction when a meeting occurs, if it takes place before using the ability for the first time in the turn.

data.name: QueenServantKillKillCoolReduceRate
data.value: Queen: Kill Cooldown reduction rate by Servants' KILL

data.name: QueenServantTaskKillCoolReduceRate
data.value: Queen: Kill Cooldown reduction rate by Servants' tasks completion

data.name: QueenServantTaskCompKillCoolReduceRate
data.value: Queen: Passive Kill Cooldown reduction rate by Servants' tasks full completion

data.name: QueenIntroDescription
data.value: It's the time to make our Kingdom!

data.name: QueenShortDescription
data.value: CHARM players and be the last stand

data.name: QueenFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive GLORY. MISSION: Halve the remaining players with your own team, and eliminate all other IMPOSTORS / NEUTRALS with the KILL ability "CHARM" : Charms and draws a player into your team! I. When a CREWMATE or IMPOSTOR is targeted: - Adds the role "Servant" to the player. This does NOT erase the f ormer role; Their roles and role abilities will be carried on. - CREWMATE-Servants will gain tasks when they have no initial tasks (i.e. Merlins) - IMPOSTOR-Servants will able to use KILL, VENT and SABOTAGE II. When a NEUTRAL is targeted: - CHANGES the player's role into "Servant". This DOES erase the former role. - The ability to KILL, VENT or SABOTAGE will be carried on, depending on the former neutral role. - The player will gain tasks when they have no initial tasks. *By your Servants' tasks and KILLs, you will gain reductions on KILL cooldowns! *On Queen's death, the Servants will die too.

data.name: ServantFullDescription
data.value:
Your Queen: {0}
A NEUTRAL role with the mission to support your majesty! MISSION: Halve the remaining players with your own team, and eliminate all other IMPOSTORS / NEUTRALS with the KILL ability *You will die when your Queen dies, protect her majesty at no costs! "KILL FLASH" : You can know a KILL taking place by a white/green flash. - White flashes means your QUEEN has used KILL - Green flashes means somebody else has used KILL "SUICIDE" : Simply kills yourself.

data.name: MadmateSeeImpostorTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate for Madmates to know Impostors

data.name: MadmateCanSeeFromImpostorTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate for Impostors to know Madmates

data.name: MadmateIsDontCountAliveCrew
data.value: Does not count Madmates as "Alive" crewmates

data.name: MadmateFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive victory. MISSION: Achive IMPOSTOR victory (including extra-wins) "SUICIDE" : Simply kills yourself. *Clearing a set amount of tasks can reveal your role to Impostors, when "Can Impostors know Madmates" is on.

data.name: UmbrerFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive victory. MISSION: Infect all players "INJECTION" : Infects targeted player after a set duration. - Can be used on a non-infected player, and changes them into "Infected players". "VITALIZE" : Vitalizes viruses and spreads infection! - Can be used on a Infected player, and activates "Virus spreading" mode - A "Virus spreading" player infects one nearby player. - By infecting a nearby player or after a set duration, "Virus spreading" mode deactivates.

data.name: QueenServantSucideWithQueenWhenHasKill
data.value: Servant: Does Servant with KILL ability suicide on Queen's death

data.name: YokoFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role that can steal almost any victory. Victory Condition: Survive and meet the victory conditions of another team (If multiple Youkos are assigned, they win simultaneously). - Victory conditions that cannot be stolen even if alive: - Crewmate task victory - Impostor sabotage victory - Merlin assassination victory (when Assassin is present) Passive Ability "SENSE PRESENCE": - Notifies if an "enemy" player is within a certain range. - "Enemy" refers to roles with kill abilities, excluding: - Villain, Vigilante, Missionary, Lovers - The "enemy" detection of Sense Presence can fail with a certain probability. - Fencer is always considered an "enemy" regardless of state. *The following are only available if "Enable abilities related to "SHRINE"" is ON - Button Ability "BUILD SHRINE": - Can be used if a certain distance away from another "SHRINE". - After a certain time, a "SHRINE" is built at that location. - Map Object "SHRINE": - Has Inactive, Activated, and Sealed states. - Inactive State: Can be transitioned to Activated state by opening the screen. - Activated State: "SHRINE'S PROTECTION" is active. Can be transitioned to Sealed state after a certain time or by opening the screen. - Sealed State: Transitions to Inactive state after a certain time. Cannot be operated by opening the screen. - "SHRINE" Passive Ability "SHRINE'S PROTECTION" (Activated state only): - Players of this role within a certain range of the shrine will not be killed by kill button kills.

data.name: HatterWinCount
data.value: Number of meeting skips to win

data.name: HatterMeetingTimerDecreaseLower
data.value: Minimum meeting time reduction rate with "KILL TIME"

data.name: HatterMeetingTimerDecreaseUpper
data.value: Maximum meeting time reduction rate with "KILL TIME"

data.name: HatterIncreaseTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate to increase "KILL TIME"

data.name: HatterFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role. Victory Condition ①: Skip meetings a certain number of times. Victory Condition ②: The number of survivors for the following becomes equal: - Impostors and Neutral roles with kill abilities - This role (Hatter) - Harmless survivors (Crewmates, etc.) excluding this role Button Ability "KILL TIME": - Reduces meeting time by a certain amount when activated. - Reduces by a random percentage between "Minimum meeting time reduction rate with "KILL TIME"" and "Maximum meeting time reduction rate with "KILL TIME"". - Meeting time display disappears depending on the value of ""Hide meeting timer with "KILL TIME"". - Completing tasks above "Task completion rate to increase "KILL TIME"" increases the number of uses by "Number of increased ability charges".

data.name: ArtistIntroDescription
data.value: Art is the most beautiful thing in the world!!

data.name: ArtistFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role. Victory Condition: Paint over a certain area with "PAINT". Button Ability "PAINT" - Activate by pressing the button. While active, a line is painted along your path. - The color painted is random.

data.name: TuckerIsKillCoolReduceOnRemove
data.value: Does "ERASE SHADOW" reduce Chimera's Kill Cooldown

data.name: TuckerHasOtherKillCool
data.value: Does Chimera have different Kill Cooldown settings

data.name: TuckerHasOtherKillRange
data.value: Does Chimera have different Kill Range settings

data.name: TuckerChimeraHasOtherVision
data.value: Does Chimera have different vision settings

data.name: TuckerChimeraApplyEnvironmentVisionEffect
data.value: Is Chimera affected by vision effects

data.name: TuckerChimeraDeathKillCoolOffset
data.value: Kill Cooldown increase/decrease amount per Chimera revival

data.name: TuckerTuckerDeathKillCoolOffset
data.value: Chimera's Kill Cooldown increase/decrease amount on Tucker's death

data.name: TuckerIntroDescription
data.value: Let's turn the sharp crewmates into Chimeras

data.name: TuckerShortDescription
data.value: Create Chimeras, erase your "SHADOWS", and win

data.name: TuckerFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role that can create nearly immortal Chimeras. Victory Condition: Impostors and Neutral roles with kill abilities are eliminated, and more than half of the survivors are on the same team. Button abilities can be switched using the mouse scroll wheel. Button Ability: "CREATE CHIMERA" - Can be activated by targeting a player within range. - Transforms the player into a "Chimera". - "Chimeras" will continue to revive as long as this role is alive. - Chimera revival is announced. Button Ability: "ERASE SHADOW" - Can be activated on a map object "SHADOW" within range. - Deletes the "SHADOW" after a certain time. - If the option "Does "ERASE SHADOW" reduce Chimera's Kill Cooldown" is ON, permanently reduces the Chimera's Kill Cooldown by a certain amount after deletion. Map Object "SHADOW" - Placed after a meeting ends. - Placement is based on this role's player position at the following times: - Periodically (disabled until "CREATE CHIMERA" is performed) - When Chimera revives - Placement position and status are shared with all players.

data.name: ChimeraFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role that revives indefinitely. Victory Condition: Impostors and Neutral roles with kill abilities are eliminated, and more than half of the survivors are on the same team. Current Tucker: {0} As long as the Tucker who created this role is alive, you can revive any number of times. Each time you revive, your Kill Cooldown value is permanently changed by a certain amount. - Tucker is notified upon revival.

data.name: TuckerTuckerDeathWithChimera
data.value: Does Chimera die when Tucker dies

data.name: IronMateBlockNum
data.value: Number of times kill can be blocked

data.name: IronMateSlowTime
data.value: Seconds movement speed changes after block

data.name: IronMatePlayerShowTime
data.value: Seconds player is displayed above corpse

data.name: IronMateDeadBodyShowTimeOnAfterPlayer
data.value: Seconds corpse is displayed after player is displayed

data.name: IronMateFullDescription
data.value: A Crewmate-like NEUTRAL role. In-game display is exactly the same as a regular Crewmate. Victory Condition: Crewmates win. - Almost the same as Crewmate and has tasks. However, does not affect task victory conditions. - Cannot report corpses. A player dummy is displayed at the corpse location for a certain time. - After the player dummy is displayed, the corpse can be seen for a certain time. - Can block kill button kills a specified number of times via options. - After blocking, Iron Mate's own movement speed is slowed by a set amount for a certain time.

data.name: MonikaFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role that eliminates players with "ERASE". Victory Condition: 3 or fewer non-"ERASED" survivors, including yourself (If exactly 3, a special meeting occurs to choose an additional winner). Button Ability "ERASE": - Can be activated by targeting one player. - Sends that player to the "TRASH BIN" layer. - "Monika" cannot recognize "ERASED" players ("TRASH BIN" players). New Layer "TRASH BIN": - A new layer added between survivors and dead, treated as semi-dead. - Players in the "TRASH BIN" are subject to the following: - Counted as survivors if not dead, and as dead if dead. - Lose speaking rights during meetings (can hear survivor chat, etc.). - Cannot send chat, etc. to survivors during meetings. - Lose ability usage and voting rights during meetings. - Cannot target "Monika" during task phase (cannot be targeted for kill either). - If "Monika" is completely eliminated from the game, surviving players in the "TRASH BIN" are released and become normal survivors.

data.name: MonikaMeetingSelectLover
data.value:
Please choose the one you loved
(You win with the voted person)

data.name: MonikaUseOtherButton
data.value: When "Monika" calls an emergency meeting, does it consume someone else's button

data.name: MonikaIsSoloTeam
data.value: Does the game continue if Monika survives alone

data.name: MonikaCanSeeTrash
data.value: Can "Monika" see players in the trash bin

data.name: HereticSeeImpostorTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate to see Impostors

data.name: HereticCanKillImpostor
data.value: Can Impostors be targeted by "CURSE KILL"

data.name: HereticShortDescription
data.value: Kill those who oppose Impostor-sama with "CURSE KILL"

data.name: HereticFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role. Victory Condition: Impostor victory (including special victories). Ability "CURSE KILL": - Kills the target in exchange for your own life. - Targeting method and "CURSE KILL" ability change depending on the mode. - Mode "During Task": - Activate by targeting a player doing a task, ability activates immediately. - Mode "Target Specify (During Task)": - Activate by targeting a player doing a task, holds them as a target. - When this role is exiled, takes the targeted player with them. - Mode "During Meeting": - Activate by targeting a player during a meeting, ability activates immediately. - Mode "Target Specify (During Meeting)": - Activate by targeting a player during a meeting, holds them as a target. - When this role is exiled, takes the targeted player with them. - Mode "On Exile": - When this role is exiled, takes a random player with them.

data.name: ShepherdSeeJackalTaskRate
data.value: Task completion rate to see Jackal

data.name: ShepherdFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL fallback sub-team role. Victory Condition: Jackal's victory (including special victories). If has kill button and is sub-team, this role becomes Jackal's sub-team role. - When Jackal and Sidekick are alive: - Not counted as Jackal team. - When Jackal and Sidekick are not alive: - Special Jackal team victory if the following are met: 1. Impostors and Neutral roles with kill abilities are eliminated. 2. More than half of the survivors are on the same team. If sub-team is off or does not have kill button, this role becomes a fallback role. - As a fallback role, this role is not assigned if Jackal is not assigned.

data.name: FurrySeeJackalTaskRate
data.value: Task completion rate to see Jackal

data.name: FurryIntroDescription
data.value: A crew with Jackal's blood flowing (?) in them

data.name: FurryFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL fallback role. This role is not assigned if Jackal is not assigned. Victory Condition: Jackal's victory (including special victories). Passive Ability "BLOOD AWAKENING": - If a Jackal whose Sidekick died first dies (exiled, killed, etc.), becomes the Jackal of that group. - When changing to Jackal, ability usage counts, etc. become 0 and cannot create new Sidekicks.

data.name: IntimateSeeYandereTaskRate
data.value: Task completion rate to see Yandere

data.name: IntimateFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL fallback sub-team role. Victory Condition: Yandere's victory (including special victories). If has kill button and is sub-team, this role becomes Yandere's sub-team role. - When Yandere is alive: - Not counted as Yandere team. - When Yandere is not alive: - Special Yandere team victory if the following are met: 1. Impostors and Neutral roles with kill abilities are eliminated. 2. More than half of the survivors are on the same team. If sub-team is off or does not have kill button, this role becomes a fallback role. - As a fallback role, this role is not assigned if Yandere is not assigned.

data.name: IntimateShortDescription
data.value: I'll get my hands dirty for Yandere-chan

data.name: IntimateIntroDescription
data.value: Yandere-chan is my precious best friend!!

data.name: SurrogatorSeeYandereTaskRate
data.value: Task completion rate to see Yandere

data.name: SurrogatorPreventKillTime
data.value: "SHADOW'S PROTECTION" : Kill Cooldown when blocking kill

data.name: SurrogatorFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL fallback role. This role is not assigned if Yandere is not assigned. Victory Condition: Yandere's victory (including special victories). Passive Ability "SHADOW'S PROTECTION": - Blocks "Beloved One's" kill button kills a certain number of times. - Block count increases by performing "WEAR CORPSE". - Current blockable count: {0} Button Ability "WEAR CORPSE": - Activate by targeting a nearby corpse. - After a set number of seconds, the corpse is erased and "SHADOW'S PROTECTION" defense count increases by 1.

data.name: SurrogatorTask
data.value: Use "WEAR CORPSE" to protect your precious person's precious person

data.name: KnightSeeQueenTaskRate
data.value: Task completion rate to see Queen

data.name: KnightFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL fallback sub-team role. Victory Condition: Queen's victory (including special victories). If has kill button and is sub-team, this role becomes Queen's sub-team role. - When Queen and Servant are alive: - Not counted as Queen team. - When Queen and Servant are not alive: - Special Queen team victory if the following are met: 1. Impostors and Neutral roles with kill abilities are eliminated. 2. More than half of the survivors are on the same team. If sub-team is off, this role becomes a fallback role. - As a fallback role, this role is not assigned if Queen is not assigned.

data.name: KnightShortDescription
data.value: Kill in place of the Queen

data.name: PawnSeeQueenTaskRate
data.value: Task completion rate to see Queen

data.name: PawnFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL fallback role. This role is not assigned if Queen is not assigned. Victory Condition: Queen's victory (including special victories).
